Articles.Content: Took a pilot up to the Science lab, now I need a name for the space station...
Is Merlin the one staying there? If so, maybe "Camelot". Otherwise, what is the purpose of the station, name it something clever based on what the station is used for.
Bardoff Kerman is the pilot, so the station could be called the "Barf Comet". http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reduced_gravity_aircraft
